text: Phir nooh (alh-e-salam) kay baad hum ney aur rasoolon ko unn ki qom ki taraf bheja so woh unn kay pass roshan daleelen ley ker aaye pus jiss cheez ko unhon ney awwal mein jhoota keh diya yeh na hua ka phir uss ko maan letay. Allah Taalaa issi tarah hadd say barhney walon kay dilon per band laga deta hai
